verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Go|strong="H0935"\w* in unto \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*: for I have \w hardened|strong="H3513"\w* his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, and the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, that I might \w shew|strong="H7896"\w* these my \w signs|strong="H0226"\w* \w before|strong="H7130"\w* him:

And that thou mayest \w tell|strong="H5608"\w* in the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and of thy \w son’s|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, what things I have \w wrought|strong="H5953"\w* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and my \w signs|strong="H0226"\w* which I have \w done|strong="H7760"\w* among them; that ye may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* how that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* came \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w*, How \w long|strong="H4970"\w* wilt thou \w refuse|strong="H3985"\w* to \w humble|strong="H6031"\w* thyself \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me? let my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, that they may \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* me.

\w Else|strong="H3588"\w*, if thou \w refuse|strong="H3986"\w* to let my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, behold, to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* will I \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* the \w locusts|strong="H0697"\w* into thy \w coast|strong="H1366"\w*:

And they shall \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* the \w face|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, that one cannot be \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: and they shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w residue|strong="H3499"\w* of that which is \w escaped|strong="H6413"\w*, which \w remaineth|strong="H7604"\w* unto you from the \w hail|strong="H1259"\w*, and shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* every \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* which \w groweth|strong="H6779"\w* for you out of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*:\f + \fr 10.5 \ft face: Heb. eye\f*

And they shall \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* thy \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, and the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of all thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of all the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*; which neither thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, nor thy \w fathers’|strong="H0001"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w*, since the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that they were upon the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*. And he \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* himself, and went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*.

And \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, How long shall this man be a \w snare|strong="H4170"\w* unto us? let the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, that they may \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* thou not \w yet|strong="H2962"\w* that \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* is \w destroyed|strong="H0006"\w*?

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* were brought \w again|strong="H7725"\w* unto \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*: and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \add but\add* who \add are\add* they that shall \w go|strong="H1980"\w*?\f + \fr 10.8 \ft who…: Heb. who and who, etc\f*

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, We will \w go|strong="H3212"\w* with our \w young|strong="H5288"\w* and with our \w old|strong="H2205"\w*, with our \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and with our \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, with our \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* and with our \w herds|strong="H1241"\w* will we \w go|strong="H3212"\w*; for we \add must hold\add* a \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Let the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* be so with you, as I will let you \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, and your little \w ones|strong="H2945"\w*: \w look|strong="H7200"\w* \add to it;\add* for \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \add is\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you.

Not so: \w go|strong="H3212"\w* now ye \add that are\add* \w men|strong="H1397"\w*, and \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; for that ye did \w desire|strong="H1245"\w*. And they were driven \w out|strong="H1644"\w* from \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Stretch \w out|strong="H5186"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* over the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* for the \w locusts|strong="H0697"\w*, that they may come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* upon the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* every \w herb|strong="H6212"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \add even\add* all that the \w hail|strong="H1259"\w* hath \w left|strong="H7604"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* stretched \w forth|strong="H5186"\w* his \w rod|strong="H4294"\w* over the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w brought|strong="H5090"\w* an \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* upon the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* all that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and all \add that\add* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*; \add and\add* when it was \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, the \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w brought|strong="H5375"\w* the \w locusts|strong="H0697"\w*.

And the \w locusts|strong="H0697"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* over all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w rested|strong="H5117"\w* in all the \w coasts|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w grievous|strong="H3515"\w* \add were they;\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them there were no \w such|strong="H3651"\w* \w locusts|strong="H0697"\w* as they, neither \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them shall be such.

For they \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* the \w face|strong="H5869"\w* of the whole \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, so that the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* was \w darkened|strong="H2821"\w*; and they did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* every \w herb|strong="H6212"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and all the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* which the \w hail|strong="H1259"\w* had \w left|strong="H3498"\w*: and there \w remained|strong="H3498"\w* not any green \w thing|strong="H3418"\w* in the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*, or in the \w herbs|strong="H6212"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, through all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

¶ Then \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* for \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* in \w haste|strong="H4116"\w*; and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and against you.\f + \fr 10.16 \ft called: Heb. hastened to call\f*

Now therefore \w forgive|strong="H5375"\w*, I pray thee, my \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* only this \w once|strong="H6471"\w*, and \w intreat|strong="H6279"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, that he may take \w away|strong="H5493"\w* from me this \w death|strong="H4194"\w* only.
And he went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, and \w intreated|strong="H6279"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* a \w mighty|strong="H3966"\w* \w strong|strong="H2389"\w* \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, which took \w away|strong="H5375"\w* the \w locusts|strong="H0697"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H8628"\w* them into the \w Red|strong="H5488"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*; there \w remained|strong="H7604"\w* not \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w locust|strong="H0697"\w* in all the \w coasts|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.\f + \fr 10.19 \ft cast: Heb. fastened\f*

But the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w hardened|strong="H2388"\w* \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, so that he would not let the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Stretch \w out|strong="H5186"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* toward \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, that there may be \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* over the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, even \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* \add which\add* may be \w felt|strong="H4959"\w*.\f + \fr 10.21 \ft even…: Heb. that one may feel darkness\f*

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* stretched \w forth|strong="H5186"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* toward \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*; and there was a \w thick|strong="H0653"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* in all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*:

They \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* not \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w another|strong="H0251"\w*, neither \w rose|strong="H6965"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w* from his place for \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*: but all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* had \w light|strong="H0216"\w* in their \w dwellings|strong="H4186"\w*.

¶ And \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* ye, \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; only let your \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* and your \w herds|strong="H1241"\w* be \w stayed|strong="H3322"\w*: let your little \w ones|strong="H2945"\w* also \w go|strong="H3212"\w* with you.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou must \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H3027"\w* also \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* and burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*, that we may \w sacrifice|strong="H6213"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 10.25 \ft us: Heb. into our hands\f*

Our \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w* also shall \w go|strong="H3212"\w* with us; there shall not an \w hoof|strong="H6541"\w* be left \w behind|strong="H7604"\w*; for thereof must we \w take|strong="H3947"\w* to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; and we \w know|strong="H3045"\w* not with what we must \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, until we \w come|strong="H0935"\w* thither.

¶ But the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w hardened|strong="H2388"\w* \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, and he \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not let them \w go|strong="H7971"\w*.

And \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Get|strong="H3212"\w* thee from me, take \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* to thyself, \w see|strong="H7200"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* no \w more|strong="H3254"\w*; for in \add that\add* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* thou \w seest|strong="H7200"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* thou shalt \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou hast \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w well|strong="H3651"\w*, I will \w see|strong="H7200"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w* no more.
